title: Cyberpunk 2077 Delayed Until December - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.27.20
description:
Imran and Fran talk about the latest delay from CD Projekt Red, an Assassin's Creed partnership with Netflix, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:07:00 - Housekeeping
DONKTOBER episode 3 with Bless and Barrett is available right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames. The finale to it all is going down this Saturday and we have dubbed it DONKOWEEN. So tune in at Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames at 12 pm pt
PSILYXOXO has hands-on with the PS5. Like, literally hands on. Embargoes and what not. kindafunny.com/ps5 has FIVE different PS5 hands-on videos. Plus, the PSILY bomber jacket is up on kindafunny.com/store.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Tom Bock, Mohammed Mohammed, & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:40 - Cyberpunk 2077 Delayed One Month
00:19:50 - Devil May Cry 5: Special Edition Will Not Support Ray Tracing on Xbox Series S (Adam Bankhurst IGN)
00:30:20 - Multiple Assassin's Creed Series In Development At Netflix (Steve Watts @ Gamespot)
00:33:11 -  do you hope this series gives us looks at other areas of history in the guise of an assassin for smaller areas that may not translate well into a video game? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:37:15 - Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night Is Heading to iOS and Android (Mat Olson @ USgamer)
00:40:50 - God of War Developer Explains PS5 Performance Mode, Save Transfers (Logan Plant @ IGN)
00:44:04 - Super Mario 3D All-Stars Will Add Inverted Camera Options In November (Jordan Oloman @ IGN)
00:49:20 - Quick Hit: Dragon Ball Z Kakarot Card Game Will Appear October 27, 2020 (Jenni Lada @ Siliconera)
00:50:15 - Required Reading: Phil Spencer on exclusivity, monetisation and game development (GameReactor)
https://www.gamereactor.eu/phil-spencer-on-exclusivity-monetisation-and-game-development/
00:52:40 - Out today
00:54:08 -  Amazon Alexa
00:55:27 -  UPSTART 
00:56:50 -  HIMS 
 Reader mail   -
01:01:05 -  - The Nano Biologist
01:02:15 - Squad Up: Mark Freeman(Zoom) - @theindieboy1 or twitch.tv/RobbyRobPlays
01:03:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary Whitta
